Segment.name: VRC
Segment.comment: To provide information about the recovery of a vehicle

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: RecoveryConditionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the condition or state of the recovered item

Field.name: RecoveryClassificationCode
Field.comment: Code specifying an item's recovery classification

SyntaxNote.name: P0102
SyntaxNote.comment: If either VRC01 or VRC02 is present, then the other is required.
